testcase.name: TC01 alerts and explicitly wait
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "demoUrl" anasayfasinda.....................................passed And kullanici 2 saniye bekler...............................................passed When kullanici Alerts buttonuna tiklar......................................passed And kullanici 2 saniye bekler...............................................passed And kullanici On button click, alert will appear after bes seconds karsisindaki click me butonuna basar.passed And kullanici Allertin gorunur olmasini bekler..............................passed And kullanici Allert uzerindeki yazinin This alert appeared after bes seconds oldugunu test eder.passed And kullanici ok diyerek alerti kapatir.....................................passed
